system.description:
The Paladin (Founder of the Legendary Heroes)
You're brave and bold, and where your fellows faltered you inspired them to press on. Now the regent stands before you, and they will answer for the evils they have brought to the land.

MAKING YOUR FOUNDER

Stats

You start with this array:
  • Iron +2
  • Glass 0
  • Sulphur +1
  • Mercury -1
  • Blood starts at 0.

Looks

Gleaming chivalric plate; basic peasant garb; rugged traveling gear

Names

Joseph, Gerda, Ambrose, Faysal, Fatima, Katerina, Zlatomir.

Weapon

Choose one:

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.jbwSN4RJqrC8RvHS]{Fists}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.Tw0UQEul6cTodri9]{Greatsword}

HISTORY

One of the other founders risked great danger to save your life. Say what they did and give their bloodline 2-pact on you. They say how you’re still wounded.

Bloodline Moves

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.47k1BLGvRSFiHIbL]{Audacious}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.WxNtFaCV07tf4iA3]{Defeat Means Friendship}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.KcMghtefTj6qgU9R]{Our Town}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.JeW53DNKaB6tjgyV]{Secret Technique}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.L3y8aeTeM8MXmZ7n]{The Will to Fight}

Shelter Move

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.vIAR2MirwF9Pigb3]{Shelter (Legendary Heroes)}

Instructions: You can drag-and-drop into your character sheet any Item you choose and it will automatically be assigned to its correct place. Everything else needs to be copy-pasted or input manually (this includes the background & details and your stats).
